name: Cursed (itch) (Legion)
description:
As a renowned explorer, you’ve always been seeking adventure. Since you heard about an ancient temple surrounded by mountains, which according to locals, is protected by monsters, you've always wanted to go there. Of course, you don't believe in the myths of the locals. 

After a long and challenging journey, you reach the temple and decide to rest a while. Suddenly, you hear a scary beastly sound reverberating across the mountains. Are the local stories about guardian monsters true?

Note: This game is currently in development. Therefore, more content will add in future updates.

Installation Guide

Download Cursed.part1.rar,Cursed.part2.rar,Cursed.part3.rar to one location and extract Cursed.part1.rar. (You may need WinRAR or any other software). Open Cursed.exe and enjoy the game.
